solution_line_template: Without the first {initial_snowflakes} snowflakes, there are {total_snowflakes_target}-{initial_snowflakes}=<<{total_snowflakes_target}-{initial_snowflakes}={snowflakes_needed}>>{snowflakes_needed} snowflakes needed.
{snowflakes_needed}/{snowflakes_per_interval}={num_intervals} 5-minute intervals are needed to get the additional snowflakes.
